alert.note: Alert for Eastern Chesterfield (Including Col. Heights); Eastern Henrico; Goochland; Powhatan; Western Chesterfield; Western Henrico (Including the City of Richmond) (Virginia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Wakefield (Eastern Virginia and Southern Maryland)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 16 at 9:14PM EDT by NWS Wakefield
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern Chesterfield, southeastern Goochland, central Henrico and eastern Powhatan Counties and the City of Richmond through 1000 PM EDT... At 914 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Sabot, or 8 miles north of Moseley, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down small trees and blow around unsecured objects. Wind impacting handling of high profile vehicles. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Bon Air around 935 PM EDT. University Of Richmond around 940 PM EDT. Richmond and Downtown Richmond around 945 PM EDT. Virginia Commonwealth University, Virginia Union University and Bensley around 950 PM EDT. Bellwood around 955 PM EDT. Highland Springs around 1000 PM EDT. Other locations impacted by this storm include Flat Rock, Fine Creek Mills, Greendale, Richmond Heights, Roslyn Hills, Holly Hills, Dumbarton, Midlothian, Drewrys Bluff and Montrose. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Eastern Chesterfield (Including Col. Heights); Eastern Henrico; Goochland; Powhatan; Western Chesterfield; Western Henrico (Including the City of Richmond)
